title: Delicious Veranda - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Apartment Life   College/University   Cooking   Easy Going Life   Heartwarming
author: Takeoka Hazuki   竹岡葉月
description: Kurisaka Mamori was given the chance to live by herself when she entered university and was attracted to the handsome salary-man next door, Agata Youji. After an unexpected event, she learned of his true self. He was a gardening man whose veranda brimmed with potted plants he grew and ate…?!>
